scripts.install-dist: cp -r ../../../../dist genkit-packages && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-common-0.0.1.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-ai-0.0.1.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-flow-0.0.1.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-providers-0.0.1.tgz
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
